Test Name: MPOX Virus DNA, Qualitative Real-Time PCR
Specimen Type: Lesion swabs, vesicular fluid, scabs, or exudate
Purpose: Qualitative detection of MPOX virus DNA in clinical specimens using real-time PCR.
Container: Sterile swab placed in viral transport medium (VTM)
Equipment: Real-Time PCR instrument (e.g., ABI 7500 or Roche LightCycler), MPOX virus DNA extraction kit, MPOX virus real-time PCR assay kit, pipettes with sterile tips, vortex mixer, centrifuge, benchtop microcentrifuge
